__e: If you're not already embarrassed by your own sad fucking existence, then I assure you nothing I can ever do or say is going to make you blush.
Let's just say that I'm the person who holds your pitiful little life in her hands.
It's the only thing in my whole life that hasn't walked out on me.

I'm forced to fight him now and crush him but at least he gave me with open hands everything that is at all good in me, and you have never given me anything but your copping mediocrity and your everlasting obsession
- What? You mean you've been to that miserable little planet as well?
Unlock this door right now, you miserable little monster!
What is it about that miserable little son of a bitch that makes me care? - Well...
My life was miserable, and I was lonely...
We have to endure lack of sleep, script by pages, and miserable life to make sure there's no shame in our every minute, every second and keep us reminded of who we are at this moment.
He blames himself for allowing such an expedition, as indeed do I for giving the wretch leave.
Why should you cling so hard to that retched life of yours, Sergius?
Not even to protect your own existence?

If you know what's good for you, you better get on that phone and tell Mr. Big-shot Farmer that I said he'd better let me on that stage or I'll crucify him in 150 newspapers every day for the rest of his useless life. - Hello, Polly.
Don't you know that it's the strength that she gives to my arm, what makes me able of fighting against such a great people?
I heard you tell him not to visit you. He was so lost, so miserable, that I forgot I was the idiot and called you.
Don't you think you're crazy to want to spend your life with a mean cripple like him?
